Keywords: Runaways , Skrulls
Real Name: Xavin
Special Powers
ONE POWER SET AT A TIME: FREE: Turn Xavin's dial to another click, noting their current click. If you do, at the end of your turn, return them to the noted click.
SUPER SKRULL IN TRAINING: Xavin can use the standard powers printed on their card for lower click #s. // If Xavin turned their dial this turn and misses all targets of an attack, they cannot turn their dial back to their noted click for the rest of the turn and can use Super Senses until your next turn.

January 16, 2022
hoojeebo
I already answered this question. Xavin can use Super Senses if THEY miss all targets. No one else is turning their dial except Xavin, so of course the text of the trait is referring to them.
January 16, 2022
fastcat99
Ugh. Getting ready to build with this card and realized the pronouns are really throwing me off. I So is it Xavin who can use super senses? I thought at first 'they' referred to characters that Xavin missed, but with it saying 'they can't turn back to a noted click and they can use SS', I'm thinking both of these apply to Xavin, not the hit opponents. This wording is frustrating, and it's not even a rules wording!
March 12, 2021
hoojeebo
It's worded correctly here. If Xavin misses all targets, Xavin CAN use Super Senses until your next turn.
March 12, 2021
fastcat99
Is that a misprint? Because the text says 'can' use, not 'can't'' use.
